headline: TransDigm’s US$3.2b Deals Deepen Aftermarket Aerospace Cash Flow Story
summary: TransDigm Group (NYSE:TDG) has announced acquisitions totaling about US$3.2b, including Stellant Systems, Jet Parts Engineering, and Victor Sierra Aviation. The deals expand TDG's reach in aerospace components and aftermarket solutions. The company has begun to initiate and integrate these transactions, marking a clear shift in how it is deploying capital. TransDigm Group focuses on highly engineered aerospace components, with a large presence in the commercial and defense aviation supply...
